Aircall is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Aircall integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: API ID API Token To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Aircall To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Aircall account . Click on the Integrations & API in the side menu and click on API Keys tab. Click on Generate an API key and enter a Key name . Copy the API ID and API Token displayed and click on Confirm . Copy the API token as it won’t be visible again. The Linked Account or end-user now have all the credentials required to connect with Aircall. ​ Actions and triggers In Cobalt, you can create orchestrations of your use-cases using Aircall actions and triggers. Following are the set of Aircall actions and triggers supported by Cobalt. Actions Triggers Call Start Outbound Call - Start an outbound call for a User from their Phone app. The User must be available, not on a call, and associated with the Number to be used for the call. Contact Create Contact - Create a new Contact that will be automatically shared across the company in Aircall. Update Contact - Update a shared Contact and get the updated Contact as the response in Aircall. Delete Contact - Delete a shared Contact from the Company in Aircall. Others HTTP Request - Make HTTP API calls to any Aircall documented REST APIs.
